short_desc: Provides transportation services for wheelchair and scooter users who are stranded due to mechanical breakdown of their mobility device, or due to medical emergency that has separated them from their wheelchair or scooter
description: Provides transportation services to people in Alameda County who use wheelchairs or scooters. The intent of this service is to provide one way transportation in the event that a breakdown potentially leaves a wheelchair or scooter user without the means to reach their final destination. This service is for motorized or manual wheelchairs and scooters that do not exceed 30 inches in width and 48 inches in length measured two inches above the ground, or more than 600 pounds when occupied. This service is available 7 days a week, 24 hours a day. In case of a mechanical breakdown either in home or outside the home, call 1-877-50-WHEEL. For emergencies, call 911.
